# duyet.net

Simple redirect application built with Deno. It redirects various slugs to their corresponding URLs.

The application maps predefined slugs to specific URLs and performs HTTP 301 redirects with analytics tracking using ClickHouse database.

## Key Features

- URL shortening and redirection service
- Real-time analytics tracking with ClickHouse
- Mini PC monitoring dashboard (temperature, power consumption, memory usage)
- Bot detection and filtering
- Statistics visualization with interactive charts

## Tech Stack

- **Runtime**: Deno with TypeScript
- **Framework**: Fresh (full-stack web framework)
- **UI**: Preact + TailwindCSS
- **Database**: ClickHouse for analytics
- **Deployment**: Deno Deploy

## Usage

Make sure to install Deno: https://deno.land/manual/getting_started/installation

Then start the project:

```bash
deno task start
```

This will watch the project directory and restart as necessary.

## Available Links

- https://duyet.net/stats - Statistics of redirections
- https://duyet.net/mini - Statistics of my Mini PC
- https://duyet.net/cv - Redirect to my resume
- https://duyet.net/about - Redirect to about me
- https://duyet.net/blog - Redirect to my blog
- https://duyet.net/github - Redirect to my GitHub profile

## About the Author

Duyet Le is a Senior Data Engineer with expertise in building large-scale data platforms, analytics systems, and developer tools. Passionate about open source, data engineering, and sharing knowledge through blogging and speaking.
